org.apache.juneau.commons.reflect.FieldInfo

Packages that use FieldInfo
Package
Description
org.apache.juneau
Marshalling API
org.apache.juneau.annotation
Bean and POJO Annotations
org.apache.juneau.commons.annotation
Annotation utilities for working with Java annotations.
org.apache.juneau.commons.reflect
Comprehensive reflection utilities for working with classes, methods, fields, constructors, and annotations in a more convenient and type-safe way than the standard Java reflection APIs.
org.apache.juneau.csv.annotation
CSV Marshalling Annotations

    Description

    FieldInfo.accessible()
    Attempts to call x.setAccessible(true) and quietly ignores security exceptions.
